Room.Name: Mayor's Office
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the office of the mayor of Kista, a consumate politician.
Room.LongDescription: The mayor isn't really dishonest, but there really isn't much for him to do. The real leaders of the city are in the Tower and Mayor Kreech simply takes his orders from them. He does, however, have to run for re-election every few years, and tries to satisfy his most important backers. He's not above taking a bribe or two. Do you have any money?
